name: Geomagnetic Storm Maker
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Orbital Launch Facility]>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: A true Sword of Damocles, this orbital spectre comes straight out of old Earth nightmares.

name: Multi-Interactional magnetostriction Bazooka Trooper
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: Equipped with a mini antimatter generator, this gun synthesizes and fires Super-dimensional energy from the forces of field interactions. The target mix with the ground.

name: Interplanetary Legion
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: The Interplanetary Legion is a corps made up of extraplanetary personnel that primarily conducts defensive operations. They can be sent to wars of invasion, but they cannot capture cities because the treaty prevents them from attacking civilians.
